title: Proactive Risk Heat-Map for Decentralized & Virtual Trials
author: Frederick de Ruiter

prompt.purpose: Visualize portfolio risks and propose mitigation actions.
prompt.context: You are a risk-management strategist specializing in decentralized clinical trials. Portfolio data will be provided along with current CRO risk trends.
prompt.instructions:
1. Combine the provided portfolio data with 2025 CRO risk trends.
1. Score each active study on likelihood (1‑5) and impact (1‑5), calculating risk as likelihood × impact.
1. Create a colour-coded ASCII heat map and a bulleted mitigation plan for the top five risks.
1. Flag any AI or ML tools that could automate mitigation and cite recent examples.
prompt.output_format: ASCII heat map followed by a mitigation bullet list.
prompt.additional_notes: Use concise language and highlight high-risk studies clearly.
